H0.text: The meibomian gland is found in which part of the human body. Nose

H1.text: The meibomian gland is found in which part of the human body. Ear

H2.text: The meibomian gland is found in which part of the human body. Lip

H3.text: The meibomian gland is found in which part of the human body. Eyelid

A4.text: Meibomian glands are sebaceous glands along the rims of the eyelid inside the tarsal plate.
